name: Ogre Mage
movement: 30 ft. walking speed and 30 ft. flying speed
description: A large giant with a blend of brute strength and magical prowess, often wielding an Iron Club and capable of shapeshifting.
memorable: Its ability to cast powerful spells while remaining physically intimidating makes it a unique threat.
goals: To control the battlefield with spells, dominate foes, and escape when necessary.
relations: May serve as a leader among ogres, possibly communing with other magical giants.
environment: Typically found in mountainous areas or regions where giants dwell.
strengths: High Strength and Constitution scores, versatile spellcaster with crowd control abilities.
weaknesses: Average Dexterity makes it less agile against nimble opponents, vulnerable to magical attacks.
attacks: Can use Multiattack to make two melee attacks, dealing slashing and bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Cone of Cold, dealing devastating area-of-effect damage.
equipment: Iron Club with magical properties targeting spells.
senses: Exceptional passive perception of 14 gives it an edge in noticing hidden foes.
skills: Proficient in arcana, deception, perception, and stealth, allowing it to engage in both combat and social situations effectively.
additional_information: Innate spellcasting abilities provide significant versatility in combat.
Ability to cast Darkness to obscure surroundings.
Can become invisible for tactical advantages.
Possesses a unique capability to dispel spells with its Iron Club.
Shapeshifting allows for tactical repositioning or escaping threats.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting through Charisma, capable of casting various spells at will and once per day.
test_queries: ogre that can fly and cast spells
creature that can cast cone of cold
ogre mage with strong melee attacks
